title: Ep. 52: Habits and Whole30 With Melissa Hartwig
description:
Ep. 52: Ask yourself, "What happens if I ignore this?" an interview with Whole30's Melissa Hartwig, I struggle with an unwanted errand, and Elizabeth discloses her favorite reality TV podcasts.  Want to get in touch? @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/52; 774-277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: Gretchen Rubin / The Onward Project
itunes:subtitle: Ask, “What Happens If I Ignore This?” a Conversation with Whole30’s Melissa Hartwig, and Elizabeth Talks Reality TV.
